title: ISSS608-VAA
text: Welcome to ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications. In this website, you will find my coursework prepared for this course.

title: About
text:
About this site

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package to check if tidyverse packages are installed in the computer. If they are, then they will be launched into R.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)





exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

Rows: 322 Columns: 7
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (4): ID, CLASS, GENDER, RACE
dbl (3): ENGLISH, MATHS, SCIENCE

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
The code chunk below uses p_load() of pacman package to check if tidyverse packages are installed in the computer. If they are, then they will be launched into R.

pacman::p_load(tidyverse)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

Rows: 322 Columns: 7
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (4): ID, CLASS, GENDER, RACE
dbl (3): ENGLISH, MATHS, SCIENCE

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Importing the data

exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

Rows: 322 Columns: 7
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr (4): ID, CLASS, GENDER, RACE
dbl (3): ENGLISH, MATHS, SCIENCE

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Hands-on Exercise 1

ggplot(data=exam_data, aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=10, 
                 boundary = 100,
                 color="black", 
                 fill="grey") +
  ggtitle("Distribution of Maths scores")

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Bar

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=MATHS)) +
  geom_bar()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Dot Plot

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_dotplot(binwidth=2.5,         
               dotsize = 0.5) +      
  scale_y_continuous(NULL,           
                     breaks = NULL)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Histogram

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=15)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Update 1

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
    geom_histogram(bins=20,            
                 color="black",      
                 fill="light blue")

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Update AES

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           fill = GENDER)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, 
                 color="grey30")

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Density

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_density()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Density 2

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x = MATHS, 
           colour = GENDER)) +
  geom_density()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Box Plot

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS,       
           x= GENDER)) +    
  geom_boxplot()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Box Plot Notches

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot(notch=TRUE)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Violin

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_violin()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Point

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Objects Combined

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, 
           x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +                    
  geom_point(position="jitter", 
             size = 0.5)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Stat Summary

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  stat_summary(geom = "point",       
               fun = "mean",         
               colour ="red",        
               size=4)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Stat Geom Method

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(y = MATHS, x= GENDER)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  geom_point(stat="summary",        
             fun="mean",           
             colour="red",          
             size=4)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Smooth

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(size=0.5)   

Warning: Using `size` aesthetic for lines was deprecated in ggplot2 3.4.0.
ℹ Please use `linewidth` instead.


`geom_smooth()` using method = 'loess' and formula = 'y ~ x'

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Geom Smooth Override

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, 
           y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              linewidth=0.5) 

`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Facets

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
    facet_wrap(~ CLASS)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Grids

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20) +
    facet_grid(~ CLASS)

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Coordinates

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Coord Flip

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Change Axis

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              size=0.5) +  
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100),
                  ylim=c(0,100))

`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Change Axis

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x= MATHS, y=ENGLISH)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method=lm, 
              size=0.5) +  
  coord_cartesian(xlim=c(0,100),
                  ylim=c(0,100))

`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Themes - Horizontal (Classic)

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_classic()

title: Hands-on Exercise 1
text:
Themes - Horizontal (Minimal)

ggplot(data=exam_data, 
       aes(x=RACE)) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal()
